mapper.select: SELECT od.odSeq ,od.odSituation ,od.odDate ,od.product_pdSeq ,od.address_adSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,ad.adName ,ad.ad1 ,ad.ad2 ,ad.ad3 ,pd.pdSeq ,path FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product pd ON od.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq LEFT JOIN address ad ON od.address_adSeq = ad.adSeq LEFT JOIN insertuploaded ON pSeq = pd.pdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND defaultNy =1 AND od.member_mmSeq = #{mmSeq} AND od.odsituation IN ('91','90','89') ORDER BY odDate DESC;

mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET odSituation = '92' WHERE 1=1 AND odSeq = #{odSeq}
